ModMetaData.name: VF - Viking Longboat
ModMetaData.author: Robot_Prince
ModMetaData.description:
Requires the Vehicle Framework: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3014915404
Add a functional, Viking style longboat (Knarr) to the game, for all your raiding needs!
-------
Based on the Fishing Boats (Continued) mod code:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2932093144
Sprite made by MillionthVector used under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
https://millionthvector.blogspot.com/
